Thank You!

Your Application Has Been Received

We've received your housing application and will review it within 24-48 hours. Our veteran team will contact you with next steps.

What Happens Next?

1

Application Review (24-48 hours)

Our team will review your application and verify your voucher information.

2

Property Matching

We'll identify properties that match your needs and voucher requirements.

3

Property Viewing

If approved, we'll schedule a viewing of suitable properties.

4

Lease Signing

Complete the paperwork and move into your new home!

Questions While You Wait?

Our team is here to help. Don't hesitate to reach out:

Call Us

(903) 555-1234

Email Us

info@properties4creations.com
